general.ctaMessage: We are Delivering the best customer Experience

about.short: To create successful software, you need a development team that understands your business requirements. Our experts will determine a custom solution that fits your idea, timeline, and budget, then design and build the application and help you test it with real users. As a result, you will get a modern digital product that benefits your business and is loved by users.
about.description: Genixo is a technology company operating in Bilkent University Cyberpark, developing AI-focused educational platforms and corporate solutions. Our team consists of developers with deep expertise in modern web technologies and AI integrations. We build scalable, secure, and user-friendly systems using powerful technologies such as Spring Boot, Next.js, and PostgreSQL. We make a difference in Turkey's educational technology ecosystem with successful projects like StudyScore AI and Egitimiste.com. We offer a wide range of solutions, from AI-powered adaptive learning platforms to corporate document management systems, from real-time exam applications to educational discovery platforms. As a trusted technology partner in our clients' digital transformation journey, we work to understand business needs and produce the most suitable solutions.

dynamism.title: Dynamism
dynamism.content: Information technology is the sector with the largest observable market share in the world, and interestingly, it didn't take long to reach this size. So how did this happen? Through technology and therefore innovation. Development and change are so fast that it can be difficult to keep up. It is becoming increasingly difficult to keep up with new dynamics and act proactively. As Genixo, our mission here is clear: to stay dynamic. Genixo's vision in this regard is to always stay current and respond to the needs of the day, no matter how fast the IT world changes and no matter how different the needs are. We have a corporate understanding that calculates the future by constantly adopting a proactive attitude and can give appropriate responses to unforeseen problems. This way we can always stay dynamic!

passion.title: Passion and Commitment
passion.content: Here, there is no commitment without passion. Without commitment, a passion can never reach its potential and is doomed to be less successful. Genixo, aware of this, is more than a company; it is a community of people who are aware that personal development has no limits, who aim to constantly improve themselves, who are passionately committed to their goals and dedicated to achieving these goals. In line with this community consciousness built on passion and dedication, we invite ourselves and everyone we work with to develop their potential, think bigger, work more dedicatedly, and be more successful!

professionalism.title: Professionalism
professionalism.content: Success can be achieved when you are talented or experienced in a job. However, for the success achieved to be permanent, a professional approach is essential; otherwise, you will definitely shorten the lifespan of the success you have achieved. The Genixo understanding aims for permanence and sustainable success both individually and corporately, with a brand culture where talented and experienced people work professionally. We don't leave success to chance with our professional business awareness.

hero.title: We Create Value with Smart Technologies.

Web Application and Cloud Development

DevOpsServices.summary: A successful DevOps model is based on four key building blocks: Develop, Build and Test, Deploy, Operate and Monitor.
DevOpsServices.name: DevOps Services
DevOpsServices.description:
A successful DevOps model is based on four key building blocks: Develop, Build and Test, Deploy, Operate and Monitor. Genixo can do this for you!

Assessment and Planning

CI/CD Pipeline
We link development operations through Continuous Deployment - Integration - Testing - Deployment.
Process Automation

Security Integration

DataScience.summary: In the 21st century, also called the Information Age, data has become increasingly valuable due to technological developments
DataScience.name: Data Science
DataScience.description:
In the 21st century, also called the Information Age, data has become increasingly valuable due to technological developments. Machines become extremely 'intelligent' to the point that even scientists cannot predict where this journey will lead. Data Science, 'the sexiest job of the 21st century' as declared by Harvard Business Review, is the combination of programming and mathematics in order to design models capable of extracting insights or making predictions better and faster compared to humans. Unprocessed data makes your business inefficient. It is only after the data has been processed that the right insights can be revealed and the analysis created in the light of these insights will carry your business to the peak of its potential. Because data is the most valuable thing of our age, reveal the value of data.

Data Acquisition
If there is not enough data to analyze, we could create the data pipeline if it is accessible or guide you to create an appropriate data acquisition system.
Data Preprocessing
Data sources are not reliable. Therefore, we cleaned the data of inaccurate, aberrant and noisy ones to create more accurate models.
Model Design
We designed a mathematical or machine learning model that describes your system as well as possible.
Data Analysis
By using the model trained by your data, we could reveal the insights of your current or upcoming data stream.
Report/Result
We could demonstrate the insights revealed by our model in a user-friendly dashboard.
There are mainly 3 techniques in data science;

Classification
Models are trained in such a way as to label data according to users' preferences. The most explanatory and cliché example of this method is spam or ham mail labeling. From the dataset, the model learns the difference between ham and spam mails and could easily label upcoming mails accordingly.
Regression
Basically, regression is finding the best-fitting function for the dataset. By using this function, correlation in the dataset or prediction of the future could be achieved.
Clustering
In scenarios where the number of classes is not predefined as in classification problems, models could be trained in such a way as to divide the dataset. These classes would help us understand the relationship and distribution in the dataset.
Data Science techniques are mainly used in;

Decision Making and Prediction
Process Optimization
Pattern Recognition
Data Analytics
Recommendation Systems
Computer Vision
Technologies we use:

ILC.name: ILC International Language Certification
ILC.summary: A comprehensive platform for international language certification and assessment.
ILC.description:
ILC International Language Certification is a cutting-edge platform designed to facilitate language learning and certification processes. Our platform provides comprehensive assessment tools, certification management, and detailed reporting capabilities.

The platform supports multiple languages and offers flexible certification pathways for learners of all levels. With advanced analytics and reporting features, educators and institutions can track progress and ensure quality standards.

Key capabilities include automated assessment, certificate generation, progress tracking, and comprehensive reporting. The platform is designed to be scalable and can accommodate institutions of all sizes.

StudyScoreAI.name: Study Score AI
StudyScoreAI.summary: AI-powered platform for educational assessment and student performance analysis.
StudyScoreAI.description:
Study Score AI leverages artificial intelligence to provide intelligent assessment and analysis of student performance. The platform uses advanced machine learning algorithms to identify learning patterns, predict outcomes, and provide personalized recommendations.

With Study Score AI, educators can gain deeper insights into student learning behaviors, identify areas that need attention, and provide targeted support. The platform offers real-time analytics, automated grading, and comprehensive reporting tools.

The system is designed to integrate seamlessly with existing educational infrastructure and can be customized to meet specific institutional needs.

Egitimiste.name: egitimiste.com
Egitimiste.summary: Comprehensive educational platform connecting students with quality educational resources.
Egitimiste.description:
egitimiste.com is a comprehensive educational platform designed to connect students with quality educational resources, courses, and institutions. The platform serves as a bridge between learners and educational opportunities.

The platform features an extensive database of educational programs, institutions, and resources. Students can search, compare, and apply for programs that match their interests and goals.

With user-friendly interfaces and powerful search capabilities, egitimiste.com makes it easy for students to find the right educational path. The platform also provides tools for institutions to showcase their programs and connect with prospective students.

GenixoWorkAI.name: Genixo Work AI
GenixoWorkAI.summary: AI-powered workplace productivity and collaboration platform.
GenixoWorkAI.description:
Genixo Work AI is an intelligent workplace platform that leverages artificial intelligence to enhance productivity, streamline workflows, and improve collaboration. The platform offers a suite of tools designed to help teams work more efficiently.

With advanced AI capabilities, Genixo Work AI can automate routine tasks, provide intelligent insights, and facilitate better decision-making. The platform integrates with popular business tools and provides a unified workspace for teams.

Key features include task automation, intelligent scheduling, document management, team collaboration tools, and comprehensive analytics. The platform is designed to scale with your organization and adapt to your specific workflow needs.

GenixoAssistant.name: Genixo Assistant
GenixoAssistant.summary: Intelligent virtual assistant for business operations and customer support.
GenixoAssistant.description:
Genixo Assistant is an advanced virtual assistant powered by artificial intelligence, designed to handle a wide range of business operations and customer support tasks. The assistant can understand natural language, process requests, and provide intelligent responses.

The platform can be integrated into websites, applications, and business systems to provide 24/7 support. It can handle customer inquiries, schedule appointments, provide information, and assist with various business processes.

With continuous learning capabilities, Genixo Assistant improves over time, providing increasingly accurate and helpful responses. The platform supports multiple languages and can be customized to match your brand voice and specific business needs.

TOMEREYadis.name: TÖMER E-Yadis
TOMEREYadis.summary: Digital platform for Turkish language education and certification.
TOMEREYadis.description:
TÖMER E-Yadis is a comprehensive digital platform designed for Turkish language education and certification. The platform provides a complete learning management system for Turkish language courses, from beginner to advanced levels.

The platform features interactive lessons, assessment tools, progress tracking, and certification management. Students can access course materials, complete assignments, take assessments, and track their progress through the platform.

Educators can manage courses, create content, assess student performance, and issue certificates. The platform supports both synchronous and asynchronous learning, making it flexible for different learning styles and schedules.

RetiredTravelApp.name: Retired Travel App
RetiredTravelApp.summary: Mobile application designed for retired travelers, providing travel planning and assistance services.
RetiredTravelApp.description:
The Retired Travel App is a specialized mobile application designed to meet the unique needs of retired travelers. The app provides comprehensive travel planning tools, destination information, and assistance services tailored for senior travelers.

The app features easy-to-use interfaces, large text options, and accessibility features to ensure it's comfortable for all users. It provides information about senior-friendly destinations, travel tips, and assistance services.

Key features include trip planning, destination guides, travel alerts, emergency assistance, and social features to connect with other travelers. The app is designed to make travel planning and navigation easier and more enjoyable for retired individuals.

ngsd.title: Genixo NGSD

forWho.title: For whom?
forWho.content: If you don't have a software team, this could be the best solution for you!

whatIs.title: What is NGSD?
whatIs.content: Our most comprehensive 360 Degree, Dynamic, International and Remote solution that takes us and you one step further in the market. Establishing a team to meet your software needs can always be seen as the clearest solution, but as it is known, establishing a software team/department can be a very costly business. This is where Genixo NGSD comes in and saves you the trouble of setting up a team/department. The Genixo project manager assigned to your brand becomes your software manager, and Genixo becomes your software department!

remote.title: Remote
remote.content: Remote but close! How? With a privileged customer experience. As Genixo, we aim for distances to be meaningless. We ensure you can continuously track processes with a transparent operational understanding, and we strive to keep our communication at the highest level by holding planned meetings and providing instant customer support. With a remote software department, we increase your efficiency, and you reduce your costs.

dynamic.title: Dynamic
dynamic.content: Our job is to adapt quickly to the dynamics of your business! Together with NGSD, we are able to continuously analyze your requirements and scale up or down the team according to the status of your projects, so we are always optimally positioned for your needs.

global.title: Global
global.content: Let the world get smaller and, you get bigger! As the world gets smaller, nobody wants to be limited locally. We also carry this motivation, we build our projects on a vision and infrastructure that can operate globally. With our transnational vision and Genixo NGSD model, it is possible for us to implement and develop all your software requirements in a structure where you can operate globally. We invite all passionate brands who agree with us to walk this path together.

ai-not-just-technology.title: Artificial Intelligence is Not Just a Technology, It's a New Work Culture
ai-not-just-technology.excerpt: Artificial intelligence is no longer just a technology that speeds up certain tasks. It is becoming a new work culture that transforms the way we work, inter-team communication, and even internal decision-making processes.
ai-not-just-technology.content:
As someone who has been following the business world for a long time, I clearly see this: Artificial intelligence is no longer just a technology that speeds up certain tasks. It is becoming a new work culture that transforms the way we work, inter-team communication, and even internal decision-making processes.

While efficiency in the past was generally achieved through the digitization of processes; today, this definition has shifted to an axis of AI-powered automation, prediction, and speed. According to McKinsey's 2024 data, employees using generative AI save an average of 5.4% of their time per week. This means approximately 2 hours of gain in a 40-hour work week. This difference, which seems small at first glance, has the potential to increase economic productivity by 1.1% in large teams and in the long term.

What is even more striking is that these technologies are transforming not only individual productivity but also the collective way of working. Decisions are now shaped by data-based analyses, not by intuition. While AI tools provide managers with more accurate predictions; employees can free up a large portion of their time from repetitive tasks and allocate it to creative processes. So much so that 93% of companies in America are already using AI-based solutions. However, only half of employees know how to work with these tools. This shows that investment should be made in culture, not technology.

The transformation of work culture is not limited to productivity. Meetings are now shorter; communication is more concise. AI-powered summaries, document analyses, and recommendation systems that enable direct access to information are coming to the fore instead of email traffic. According to IBM's 2024 report, 90% of employees using AI say these tools save time. This shows us that AI tools are not just "assistants" but have actually become a new colleague.

Amidst all this transformation, we have started to bring to life the project we have been working on for a while with the goal of not just observing but contributing: Genixo Work AI. Our goal is to make AI a natural part of work life. We are developing this platform to enable teams to access information faster, make more informed decisions, and create more efficient processes. So we are not just producing software; we are designing the next-generation work culture.

This platform aims for a next-generation business culture where teams can initiate complex business processes with simple commands in natural language (for example, "prepare last month's sales report and create proposals for new customers"); where AI is not just supportive but an active actor in the business.

The project is still in its early stages — but in every line of code, in every moment of decision, we remain faithful to the fundamental question: "Will we work just faster with AI, or will we work completely differently?"

I would like to connect and exchange ideas with everyone who sees AI not just as a technology, but as a mindset that shapes the future of business. I am here to learn and progress together with those who want to be part of this transformation.
